sentences.english: In this paper the mining practice of extra high grade ore is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍特富矿的采矿实践。

sentences.english: Yu Yuan-guis prose outlook is a rich academic ore.
sentences.chinese: 俞元桂先生的散文观是一座学术的富矿。

sentences.english: The overprinted part of the early and late stages is the ore shoot part in the ore area.
sentences.chinese: 早晚两期成矿叠加部位构成矿区内富矿段。

sentences.english: Reducibility is an important index for evaluating the quality of iron ore agglomerates.
sentences.chinese: 还原性能的好坏，是评价人造富矿质量的重要指标。

sentences.english: The mine produces classic power coal and rich ore of combustible shale.
sentences.chinese: 该矿的产品为优质动力煤和油母页岩富矿。

sentences.english: They crossed the Yukon River and found the bonanza gold.
sentences.chinese: 他们穿越了育空河，找到了黄金富矿。

sentences.english: Both these rich deposits were discovered after liberation.
sentences.chinese: 这两座富矿都是解放后发现的。

sentences.english: This is the first time in China to discuss the mineralization pattern of granite type rich-uranium ore comprehensively.
sentences.chinese: 第一次全面阐述了花岗岩型铀矿富矿成矿规律。

definition: to excavate/to dig out/fig. to investigate (in an archive)
remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
precious mineral deposits/hidden treasure/(fig.) treasure/(Buddhism) the treasure of Buddha's law
to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
to hold in store/to contain (untapped reserves etc)
